Key Match Events: Jhon Cordoba scored the opening goal in the 8th minute
James Rodriguez doubled the lead in the 15th minute from the penalty spot
Luis Diaz added a third just before halftime
Richard Rios scored a long-range goal in the 71st minute
Miguel Borja scored a penalty in the 92nd minute
Post-Match Reflections: Colombia have the longest unbeaten streak in global men's soccer in the international game at the moment
Miscellaneous Highlights: Colombia advance to Copa America semifinals
Others: James Rodriguez was named MVP of the match
Panama's defense was criticized for their performance
